item.title: The joyless task of creating a free website
item.dc:creator: Ajbattle
item.description: ttle over a year ago I fell out of love with WordPress.com. At that point I stopped working on that website. However the issue with this is that I am an artist and designer who doesn’t successfully promote their work through social media and a website is a vital tool for promoting my work, getting […]
item.content:encoded:
ttle over a year ago I fell out of love with WordPress.com. At that point I stopped working on that website.

However the issue with this is that I am an artist and designer who doesn’t successfully promote their work through social media and a website is a vital tool for promoting my work, getting it out to clients and sharing my own joy in making art
